issue.title: [CF 954] /say [Spell] don't show spell name
issue.body:
i'm add icon with /say notification [Spell] [Duration:TMWFormatDuration]
it not shows spell name
in tmw 6.xx all works perfectly, tmw 7 broke it

export:

comments.body:
Sorry about that, and thanks for the report. Fixed in g5c037e0
